ygData.subject: [eqbards] Elfson DragonSlayer
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I was bored last night, playing my warrior twink (I will only play Elfson with guildies and for big raids now that he is 47), and I get a tell that a
ygData.messageBody:
Well I was bored last night, playing my warrior twink (I will only play
Elfson with guildies and for big raids now that he is 47), and I get a tell
that a group has cleared the fire giants but has decided they are a bit weak
to drop Naggy, so "How fast can you get your blue butt up to SolB?"

Woohoo! My first dragon run!

They were pretty experienced at this, so things went very smoothly (one
melee group bit it when their bard went down), and he dropped very quickly
(or so it seemed to me). I was in the xp group, which is a nice bonus...

He even dropped his drum, which was given (deservedly so) to ther other bard
there who had been on several Naggy raids in the past.

My original EQ goal has been accomplished!
